comment:
Variables:
- \( x \): number of small trucks
- \( y \): number of large trucks

Constraints:
- Number of people constraint: \( 2x + 4y \leq 30 \)
- Minimum number of small trucks constraint: \( x \geq 10 \)
- Minimum number of large trucks constraint: \( y \geq 3 \)
- Ratio of small to large trucks constraint: \( x = 2y \)

Objective:
- Maximize \( 30x + 50y \)
